verses.verse: O <S%G453>foolish<s%> <S%G1052>Galatians,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> has <S%G940>bewitched<s%> you, that you should not <S%G3982>obey<s%> the <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G2596>before<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> has been <S%G4270>evidently<s%> <S%G4270>set<s%> <S%G4270>forth,<s%> <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you?

<S%G5124>This<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> I <S%G3129>learn<s%> of you, <S%G2983>Received<s%> you the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> by the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> by the <S%G189>hearing<s%> of <S%G4102>faith?<s%>
Are you <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G453>foolish?<s%> having <S%G1728>begun<s%> in the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> are you <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2005>made<s%> <S%G2005>perfect<s%> by the <S%G4561>flesh?<s%>
<S%G2192>Have<s%> you <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>many<s%> things in <S%G1500>vain?<s%> <S%G1489>if<s%> it be <S%G2596>yet<s%> in <S%G1500>vain.<s%>

He <S%G3767>therefore<s%> that <S%G2023>ministers<s%> to you the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> and <S%G1754>works<s%> <S%G1411>miracles<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you, does he it by the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> by the <S%G189>hearing<s%> of <S%G4102>faith?<s%>
<S%G2531>Even<s%> as <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> and it was <S%G3049>accounted<s%> to him for <S%G1343>righteousness.<s%>
<S%G1097>Know<s%> you <S%G686>therefore<s%> that they which are of <S%G4102>faith,<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> are the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham.<s%>

And the <S%G1124>scripture,<s%> <S%G4275>foreseeing<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> would <S%G1344>justify<s%> the <S%G1484>heathen<s%> <S%G1537>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G4283>preached<s%> <S%G4283>before<s%> the <S%G4283>gospel<s%> to <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> saying, In you shall <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> be <S%G1757>blessed.<s%>
<S%G5620>So<s%> then they which be of <S%G4102>faith<s%> are <S%G2127>blessed<s%> with <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G11>Abraham.<s%>

For as <S%G3745>many<s%> as are of the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> are <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G2671>curse:<s%> for it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G1944>Cursed<s%> is <S%G3956>every<s%> one that <S%G1696>continues<s%> not in <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G975>book<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> them.

But that <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> is <S%G1344>justified<s%> by the <S%G3551>law<s%> in the <S%G3844>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> it is <S%G1212>evident:<s%> for, The <S%G1342>just<s%> shall <S%G2198>live<s%> by <S%G4102>faith.<s%>
And the <S%G3551>law<s%> is not of <S%G4102>faith:<s%> but, The <S%G444>man<s%> that <S%G4160>does<s%> them shall <S%G2198>live<s%> in them.

<S%G5547>Christ<s%> has <S%G1805>redeemed<s%> us from the <S%G2671>curse<s%> of the <S%G3551>law,<s%> being <S%G1096>made<s%> a <S%G2671>curse<s%> for us: for it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G1944>Cursed<s%> is <S%G3956>every<s%> one that <S%G2910>hangs<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> a <S%G3586>tree:<s%>

That the <S%G2129>blessing<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham<s%> might <S%G1096>come<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> that we might <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

<S%G80>Brothers,<s%> I <S%G3004>speak<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the manner of <S%G444>men;<s%> <S%G3676>Though<s%> it be but a <S%G444>man's<s%> <S%G1242>covenant,<s%> yet if it be <S%G2964>confirmed,<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G114>cancels,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1928>adds<s%> <S%G1928>thereto.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> to <S%G11>Abraham<s%> and his <S%G4690>seed<s%> were the <S%G1860>promises<s%> <S%G4483>made.<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> not, And to <S%G4690>seeds,<s%> as of <S%G4183>many;<s%> but as of <S%G1520>one,<s%> And to your <S%G4690>seed,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

And <S%G5124>this<s%> I <S%G3004>say,<s%> that the <S%G1242>covenant,<s%> that was <S%G4300>confirmed<s%> <S%G4300>before<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> which was <S%G5071>four<s%> <S%G5071>hundred<s%> and <S%G5144>thirty<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> <S%G3326>after,<s%> <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G208>cancel,<s%> that it should <S%G2673>make<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of <S%G208>none<s%> <S%G2673>effect.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> be of the <S%G3551>law,<s%> it is <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> of <S%G1860>promise:<s%> but <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5483>gave<s%> it to <S%G11>Abraham<s%> by <S%G1860>promise.<s%>

<S%G5101>Why<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> serves the <S%G3551>law?<s%> It was <S%G4369>added<s%> <S%G5484>because<s%> of <S%G3847>transgressions,<s%> <S%G891>till<s%> <S%G3757><s%> the <S%G4690>seed<s%> should <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G1861>promise<s%> was <S%G1861>made;<s%> and it was <S%G1299>ordained<s%> by <S%G32>angels<s%> in the <S%G5495>hand<s%> of a <S%G3316>mediator.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> a <S%G3316>mediator<s%> is not a mediator of <S%G1520>one,<s%> but <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1520>one.<s%>

Is the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G1860>promises<s%> of <S%G2316>God?<s%> <S%G3361>God<s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3361>forbid:<s%> <S%G1096><s%> for <S%G1487>if<s%> there had been a <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2227>given<s%> <S%G2227>life,<s%> <S%G3689>truly<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> should have <S%G2258>been<s%> by the <S%G3551>law.<s%>

But the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> has <S%G4788>concluded<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> that the <S%G1860>promise<s%> by <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> might be <S%G1325>given<s%> to them that <S%G4100>believe.<s%>

But <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> we were <S%G5432>kept<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G4788>shut<s%> up to the <S%G4102>faith<s%> which <S%G3195>should<s%> afterwards be <S%G601>revealed.<s%>
<S%G5620>Why<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> was our <S%G3807>schoolmaster<s%> to bring us to <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> that we might be <S%G1344>justified<s%> by <S%G4102>faith.<s%>
But after that <S%G4102>faith<s%> is <S%G2064>come,<s%> we are <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G2089>longer<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> a <S%G3807>schoolmaster.<s%>
For you are <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> by <S%G4102>faith<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
For as <S%G3745>many<s%> of you as have been <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> have <S%G1746>put<s%> <S%G1746>on<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

There is <S%G3756>neither<s%> <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G1672>Greek,<s%> there is <S%G3756>neither<s%> <S%G1401>bond<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G1658>free,<s%> there is <S%G3756>neither<s%> <S%G730>male<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G2338>female:<s%> for you are <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
And <S%G1487>if<s%> you be <S%G5547>Christ's,<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> are you <S%G11>Abraham's<s%> <S%G4690>seed,<s%> and <S%G2818>heirs<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1860>promise.<s%>
